system.model

Class DynamicGesture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leapmotion.leap.Interface
      • com.leapmotion.leap.Gesture
        • system.model.CustomGesture
          • system.model.DynamicGesture
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClapGesture

    public abstract class DynamicGesture
extends CustomGesture
    This abstract class of dynamic gesture extend from Leap Motion Gesture. Each gesture has its own state and is Enable or not. Each gesture has his own gesture threshold to maintain smoother performance.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Andy Tsang
